10195000.<pc>は\n女神の紫光石を わたされた！<se_nots System Ite: <pc> was given the Purple Goddess Gem!<se_nots System Item>

52930.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「よう。あんた:
Hey. You have good eyes. You're quite a sight to behold, but it's not the time for me yet. Heh. When you reach 50 in any one of the
locations, if you want to reach even higher, come see me again.

71229.「オレさまの儀式を受けるのは まだ早え。\n チャラい聖使者の儀式を こなしてか:
You are not ready for my ritual yet. You'll have to go through the rituals of the flirtatious messenger before you can come back
here again. I'll be waiting for you.

52938.<attr><feel_normal_lv1><end_attr>「オレさまの名:
My name is Kilpappo. I've reached level 50 . I heard about you from the flirtatious messenger. I'm very, very short-
tempered. I'd like to perform the ritual quickly, but that's the rule. I'll explain. The role of a messenger in the service of the
Six Saints is to elevate a reasonably strong adventurer like you to a higher level. Now, . You will go through this ritual
to show that you are the Chosen One.

52939.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「じゃあ さっそ:
So let's get started right away. As you may already know, the liberation ritual requires a stone offering to the River of Light. Since we
are underground and close to the River of Light, we can receive the blessings of the goddess and perform the liberation ceremony
perfectly. Here, let me give you this. This is the Purple Goddess Gem.

52941.<attr><feel_normal_lv1><end_attr>「あんたにも:
<attr><feel_normal_lv1><end_attr>You heard the voice of the Goddess, didn't
you? The ritual is now complete.

52942.<attr><feel_normal_lv1><end_attr>「……さて 多:
<attr><feel_normal_lv1><end_attr>Well, you've done a lot of Holy Messenger
rituals, and you've made it this far. From now
on, I'm going to talk seriously.<bw_break>

52943.<attr><feel_normal_lv1><end_attr>「オレらが あ:
The reason we support adventurers like you is to prepare for the coming battle against the source of the great darkness. It is said to be
incomparably more dangerous than Netherlord Nergel. That's why we're adding more and more strongmen to our ranks. We don't have time to
wait for something to happen. Now, the trial ceremony is finally coming to a close. This is the last of the rituals that we, the Holy
Messengers, will be giving. Oh, that doesn't mean the entire trial ceremony is over. It means that the rituals given by the messengers
are over. Do you understand? The last person waiting for you is War Mother, one of the Six Saints whom we Holy Messengers serve. War
Mother is rumored to have made her appearance in the Budley Rock Zone of the Ogreed Continent. It is said that she now resides in
the mountain cabins. You'd better get your asses in gear.

52950.<attr><feel_normal_lv1><end_attr>「さてと 試練:
Well, the trial ceremony is finally coming to an end. As a matter of fact, this is the last of the rituals that we, the Holy Messengers,
will be giving. The last one awaits the War Mother, one of the Six Saints. Rumor has it that she has made her appearance at the Budley
Rock Zone in Ogreed Continent. He seems to have found a place in the mountain cabin. You'd better get your strength up.

52951.<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「闘戦聖母さまの:
<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>I see you've undergone the War Mother's
ritual. There's nothing more I can do for you.
Well, I look forward to your success.
